lead_paragraph: GOLDSTEIN--William. William "Bill" Alfred Goldstein. April 19, 1931-July 4, 2016. He is survived by his son and daughter-in-law, Bill and Laurie Goldstein, his daughter, Laurie Goldstein Hawver and son-in-law, Dean Chantiles, and his four greatest joys his grandchildren: Max, Mary, Jason and Lindsey. Bill owned and ran a multi-generational real estate brokerage and management company. In lieu of flowers, please raise a glass and celebrate a life well lived! 1/3
